title: Status

StatusNotConnected.paragraph2: <0>For mer informasjon om hvordan du kommer i gang med BTFS kan du <1>lese guiden</1>.</0>

AskToEnable.label: Hjelp oss å forbedre denne appen ved å sende anonyme bruksdata.

step1.title: Status page
step1.paragraph1: This is the starting point of your BTFS node and where you can check its basic info.
This is the starting point of your BTFS node and where you can check its basic info.

step2.title: Connection status
step2.paragraph1: This takes you to a page where you can check if you are connected to an BTFS daemon, and if not, how to connect to one.
This takes you to a page where you can check if you are connected to an BTFS daemon, and if not, how to connect to one.
step2.paragraph2: You can configure your node with a custom API address, too.

step3.title: Node Info
step3.paragraph1: Here you have information about the size of your repo, how many peers are connected, your peer ID and the BTFS flavour that's currently in use.
Here you have information about the size of your repo, how many peers are connected, your peer ID and the BTFS flavour that's currently in use.
step3.paragraph2: <0>Click on <1>Advanced</1> to see more info such as the gateway URL and addresses.</0>

step4.title: Network bandwdith/traffic
step4.paragraph1: This chart shows the network bandwidth usage over time.
step4.paragraph2: The speedometers show the current outgoing and incoming traffic.

stepExplore.title: Utforsk
stepExplore.paragraph: Paste a CID and explore the files contained behind the CID or see how that data is structured and linked across protocols.

bandwidthStatsDisabled: Du har båndbreddeberegningene deaktivert. Du kan aktivere dem ved å skrive kommandoen under, eller endre nøkkelen <1>Swarm.DisableBandwidthMetrics</1> til <3>false</3> på <5>Innstillinger</5>. Deretter må du starte BTFS-demonen på nytt for å kunne bruke endringene.

Du har båndbreddeberegningene deaktivert. Du kan aktivere dem ved å skrive kommandoen under, eller endre nøkkelen <1>Swarm.DisableBandwidthMetrics</1> til <3>false</3> på <5>Innstillinger</5>. Deretter må du starte BTFS-demonen på nytt for å kunne bruke endringene.
